112.content:
Summer had finally come, and everybody in school could finally relax and enjoy life. Zack and Cody were no exceptions, and they were already well at work in their laziness on the very first Saturday off.

The twins were currently on the couch, watching tv together. Cody wore a pair of mesh shorts while Zack wore just a pair of loose boxers. "This is the life!" Zack exclaimed, glad to finally get a break from school. "You said it!" Cody replied, stretching his arms.

The two boys were fully prepared to relax, as they had brought a ton of junk food and video games. Cody would normally object, but he didn't this time because summer was just starting, and he wanted to enjoy himself as much as anyone else.

1121.content:
After the stopped playing video games, the twins began to watch television and eat food. Cody opened a box of Oreos and began stuffing them down his throat. Zack then opened a bag of chips and started to stick his hand in the bag and put the chips in his mouth. When they were both done, they would move on to the next item on the menu. Cody grabbed two boxes of twinkies and started sucking them down one by one. He didn't even keep track of how much he ate. Meanwhile, Zack began to munch on some ice cream and continued to until the box was empty. Both twins kept on doing this with multiple snacks until it was finally midnight.

"That was a great day," Zack said to his brother.

"You said it. I like being able to relax," Cody said while he grinned with food around his mouth.

"Well you know you can do that more," Zack mentioned.

"I definitely will this summer. I just want to take it easy," Cody said.

"We will! Don't worry. Man, we ate a ton," Zack said and looked around the room to see multiple wrappers.

"Wow. I can't believe I ate so much!" Cody said freaked out.

"But it was nice, right?" Zack asked.

"I mean, I guess it was. As long as I don't do this the whole summer," Cody said with a sigh.

But in his head, what he didn't want to be was the fatter twin.

11213.content:
Over the next week, Zack and Cody gorged to their hearts content, living the true suite life.

Currently, Zack was inhaling large quantities of bacon, eggs, pancakes, waffles, and sausages and the grease was running down his three chins. Of course, Zack's happiness at his constant indulging might have been dented if he'd been worried - or even knew - about his figure and health. The countless meals, snacks, dinner parties with interviews by his mother who was now becoming quite famous, buffets, takeouts and midnight feasts which he sneaked from the fridge at night after his mother had gone out to sing, had taken their toll in added inches and pounds. Fresh blubber surged from his already overstuffed, overblown and obese body. Fat piled upon fat that rested on fat. Every inch of his soft, pampered body seemed to be drowning in the flabby flesh that piled on and on as he ate and ate and ate.

Zack was like a ball, bulging out from the front, the back, and the sides with his thick flab. His long haircut emphasized his moon-shaped face. Years of gorging had swollen him to impressive proportions and consuming enough food to feed a small African nation barely dented his raging hunger. The previous day's dinner had been the culmination of a week's worth of unrivalled gluttony for him, and it would take more than bacon, eggs, pancakes, waffles, and sausages to satisfy the bloated boy's greed. Enabled by his oblivious mother and plumpening brother, Zack had unleashed his hedonistic appetites, surrendering himself completely to his lust for overindulgence and excess. Every whim of his ravenous belly had been satisfied, every desire of his overfed body attended to; in fact, this was the first day that Zack had been out of bed for the entire week as he and Cody had stayed in bed playing video games all week and Cody, being the best chef, had only left to make them food. Days spent eating with wild abandon had left Zack almost beyond self-control – he was a slave to the demands of the gluttonous daemon that dwelt within the depths of his monstrously swollen stomach and he had clearly reached a new level of obesity whilst under the influence of his brother's constant onslaught of food. Sure, he was used to overeating every day, there was no denying it, but recent experiences had heightened his gluttonous tastes to a new peak.

His cheeks were bulging, his chins were swollen and he wore a blue World of Warcraft t-shirt that his spreading, jiggly belly - which was a pale roll of jelly that flopped down onto his lap - was practically bursting out of. He'd grown a plump set of man-boobs that stretched the shirt around the neck; the sweat pants he wore were equally strained and Cody knew, without a doubt, that the prodigious expansion of Zack's gut meant that even his largest pair of jeans could no longer hope to button; he'd wrestled with them for an hour that morning and had only succeeded in covering himself in sweat and getting the jeans wedged halfway up his thighs; being unable to squeeze into them was the reason Zack was in a pair of sweat pants.

Cody, despite having started the week as someone barely avoiding anorexia, had swollen like his brother; just as huge, flabby and wide, he sat at the table, shirtless and in sweat pants, shovelling Yorkshire Puddings into his mouth. Carey had, at the beginning of the week, left for six months to do a tour in France, trusting her two sons to look after themselves and not ever imagining that they would expand in weight by so much in so short a time.

Cody burped and Zack followed seconds later; both reclined in their chairs, their hands on their bellies, stuffed, glutted and sated - or at least for now.

What happens next?

Maddie grabbed a box of each bar flavor and headed home, still munching. By the time she got home, her family had settled in front of the television to watch some late night soap opera.

Going to the refrigerator, she saw a small and large portion of meatloaf casserole. Instinctively, her hand went for the small portion before her stomach grumbled huh Maddie thought I didn't realize i was so hungry!

Again, Maddie shrugged it off thinking nothing of it as she went for the large portion, heating it up in the microwave and pouring herself a large glass of milk. Once it was all heated up she sat down at the worn kitchen table and dug in as her parents' attention was on her brothers fighting over who was the strongest.

Maddie managed to clear the plate and finish her milk, cleaning up after herself before heading up to her room with the candy bars. That night as she fantasized about her dress, she munched on another two bars before falling to sleep, her very full and bloated belly sticking out ever so slightly.
1431.title: Just a little taste...

1432.content:
Maddie took another bite out of the candy bar she was eating and her tongue was overwhelmed by it's sweet and savory flavor. She took another bite of the candy, layered with chocolate, wafer, and nuts; Maddie's favorite.

Her only thought to what she was doing was that it felt amazing. Maddie couldn't stop herself from grabbing the next candy bar, or the next, or the next after that. All she cared about was the chocolaty and nutty goodness underneath each and every wrapper.

She didn't know about the addictive and fattening behavior that these candies contained, and continued eating for quite some time. Time flew as she gorged on the succulent treats. She ate for another...
1432.title: Addictive and extra fattening

14323.content:
For the rest of her shift, Maddie ate candy bar after candy bar. The strange thing was that she didn't feel full at all. The only thoughts that came to her head were "Mmm..." and "More!" With every candy bar she ate, Maddie slowly gained weight. Her normally flat stomach bulged slightly outward from all of the candy she was eating.

When her shift had come to an end, Maddie snapped out of her eating trance.

"Wow, those candy bars were delicious." Maddie said to herself. Even though she had to leave, Maddie took all of the candy from the desk and brought it with her, oblivious to her rounder stomach, and the messy chocolate around her lips and on her fingers. (Another side effect of the sweets caused extreme lack of self awareness, causing her to be lazier and care free.)

When she reached her room, Maddie layed down on her bed, turned on the TV and began to relax. While she was watching tv, Maddie snacked on the candy bars she brought with her.

Her cycle of mindlessly gorging on candy bars continued for...
14323.title: Until her shift was over

1512.content: What do you mean stops playing basketball?
1512.title: She Stops Playing Basketball

15123.content:
"Yeah, it looks like you are healing up better," the doctor said to Max and her mother.

Currently, they were all looking at an x-ray in the doctor's office of Max's ankle. She had been playing basketball months prior. She went for a jump shot, and someone else ran into her making her fall wrong on her foot. This shattered her ankle to pieces and created a huge problem. After months of physical therapy, and even surgery, progress was coming along, but it was still certain that Max had to hang up her shoes and not play basketball anymore. She had a feeling about that from the start, but this didn't change her.

Max was still the same old tomboy with her loose fitting clothing, a black beanie, tan skin, and a slick attitude. However, over the last few months, since Max wasn't exercising like she used to, she had put on a few pounds. By a few, it was no more than ten. You could see a tiny hint of a double chin that was as minuscule as an ant in a kitchen. Some other parts of her body had gotten bigger from this, for example, her boobs, stomach, and arms. However, she was still in considerably decent shape.

"How much better does it look?" Max asked.

"We'll, you are to the point where you can now walk on it with no cautions of hurting your ankle any further. However, it is not the same as before," the doctor told her flat out.

"So can she play any sports? I know that winter basketball is starting up soon," her mother asked.

"Anyone can no matter what. However, if she does, she will be in major amounts of pain. She wouldn't be able to handle it," the doctor continued.

"So..... It's over?" Max asked.

"I'm afraid so. I can't sign you off to compete in these sports. It's for your own safety and health," the doctor said.

Immediately, Max looked down and cried a tear, but she quickly acted strong and held herself together.

"Thank you, Doctor. We will see you soon," her mother said soon enough as the appointment ended and they both walked out.

"I'm sorry, sweetie," Max's Mom said.

"It's okay. I just need to find a new hobby," Max said with a sigh.

"Well I know you will," she said as she hugged her daughter.

"Hey Mom, I am going to go to the mall if that's okay. Can you please drop me off there?" Max asked.

"Sure," her mother smiled.

After ten minutes of driving, they arrived at the mall as Max's Mom dropped her off and drove away. Max was happy to have the alone time to think thing through.
15123.title: Max Gets Injured

choices: Max Takes A BIG Bite To Eat
At Her Home, Max Weighs Herself
151232.content:
"Great. I can't play basketball. Oh how do I tell my friends?" She said to herself while she put her hat on.

She knew she was one of the best players and if she tells them she needed to stop playing basketball it would seem like she let them down. While she would rather play with them. At the other hand Cody would be able to play in her place. But he was pretty worthless.
She slowly walked through the mall. She hardly felt her ankle but knew for sure she wasn't going to play basketball for some time.

"Hey Max. Is that you?"

Max looked up and saw Tapeworm, Zack and Cody. All three seemed happy to see her. She decided she might as well tell them. They would find out sooner or later she stopped the team so she might as well tell people now.

"Glad to see you again Max. Then our team is finally ready again to win. Cody is hopeless." Zack said.

"Hurtful." Cody said. "Do you know there are some basketball players that use their high intellect to score?"

"Maybe, but you're surely not one of them." Zack said with a grin.

"To be honest, I need to tell you guys something." Max said. "I... I... I stopped playing basketball."

"What? You can't stop. You're one of our best players. Without you we're stuck with Cody." Zack said.

"Listen I don't want to stop but the doctor warned me that I will be in serious pain if I do play. It won't be good for me. Believe me I love to play basketball and I don't want to let you down but I just can't play. I'm really sorry you guys. I really want to help you and I will be there but this time like audience. I will cheer for you but..."

Max slowly bent over and the others heard some soft crying. That was kind of rare since Max was pretty tough and they never saw her cry before. Cody did her best to comfort her. After about a minute or two Max got herself back under control and sighed deeply.

"I'm really sorry you guys. But who knows. Perhaps you will find a better player than me. Who knows! Cody might get better."

"Cody? Get's better? Not a chance. We have a bigger chance with London becoming smart." Zack said.

"Again, hurtful."

"Well I can still hang out with you guys, right? I must say I'm hungry. Who wants to grab a bite to eat?" Max asked.

"Oh I do!" Tapeworm said.

"Sure. Why not?" Zack said looking at Max. "Talking about eating Max, did you gain a little?"

"Zack, you really don't know what to say to girls, do you?" Max said but at the same time thinking that her clothes did feel a bit tighter. At home she might check her weight.
151232.title: I Stopped Playing Basketball

1512321.content:
"Let's go to McDonalds," Zack suggested.

"Good idea. It's cheap and tasty," Tapeworm said.

"Yeah, just like your attitude," Cody mumbled.

"What was that?" Zack asked.

"Nothing," Cody quickly said back as they walked in McDonalds.

Tapeworm approached the register first and ordered a cheeseburger with a large fry. Everyone else laughed at how little he got.

"I can even eat more than that," Cody laughed as he began to order. He got three dollar menu mcdoubles, a large fry, and a snack wrap. Quite content with what he ordered, Zack came over with bigger ideas in mind. Zack ordered up one quarter pounder with a large fry, four mcdoubles, and a snack wrap, trying to show his dominance.

"What are you getting, Max?" Cody wondered.

"More than Zack is getting," Max said with a grin as she went up to the register. "I'll take a double quarter pounder, a large fry, five mcdoubles, and two snack wraps!"

All the boys looked at her in awe as she ordered and had a tab close to fifteen dollars. Zack went over to her.

"Well, I hope that stomach of yours can hold it down," Zack taunted.

"What? Someone upset that I can eat more than them?" Max mocked.

"Hey, I'm not the one getting fatter," Zack said sharply.

"Hey, Zack, shut the hell up and lay off of her. You don't say that to a girl, especially such a great person like Max. Lay off," Cody yelled. Everyone got quiet and Max was surprised.

"I'm sorry, Max," Zack said as they all grabbed their food.

Max would have replied, but she was so happy with Cody. Yes, she was tough, but no one rarely stuck up for her. She used to have a thing for Zack, but they went on a date and he turned out to be terrible. Maybe Cody would be different. Max sat down at their booth next to Cody. Max took off Cody's tassel hat to get his attention. She whispered in his ear.

"Thank you. No one has ever stuck up for me," she said and then slammed his hat back on. He smiled in disbelief.

They all began to be quiet as they ate in peace. Tapeworm and Cody ate a little slower, but Max and Zack did not let up. Cody kept on glancing over at Max as she got grease and mustard on her face. Mac noticed him glancing over, but kept on eating her over two thousand calorie meal. But the one thing that was satisfying her most of all was the fact that she was eating more than Zack.

Cody and Tapeworm were done while Zack ate his last mcdouble. Max was now finishing her snack wraps. She stuffed them both in her mouth and let out a small moan as she was beginning to feel full.

"Wow. You ate more than us," Tapeworm said.

"Yeah, that was great," Cody said with a grin to Max.

Of course, Zack said nothing as he was feeling bitter from earlier. Max felt satisfied as she was stuffed to the brim with food. She needed to weigh herself. And hopefully, she could figure something out and try dating Cody.
1512321.title: Max Takes A BIG Bite To Eat

choices: I'm not sure if that looks good
15123212.content:
"All right Max. Pull yourself together. There's nothing wrong. Don't worry. Perhaps there's nothing to worry about."

She was at home in the bathroom. She was just in her bra and panties. She planned to weigh herself but was a bit worried. She was never worried about her weight before. There was't a reason for. All her clothes fitted her perfectly and she played basketball and was in great shape. But now everything was different. Her clothes felt tight, she did't played basketball for some time thanks to her ankle and she would't play basketball for a long time, She thought she was still in good shape. But would she stay in good shape now she stopped basketball. She planned to weigh herself but was already staring at the scale for a minute like if it was a monster that would attack if you came near it.
Max slowly went over too the scale and stand on it and closed her eyes. She waited a few seconds and opened her eyes and looked at the number.

"5 pounds! I gained 5 pounds! I can't believe it. No wonder my clothes felt tight."

She let her head hung. She must admit that Zack had been right. She was getting fat. Normally she would't worry about it since she could work it of by playing basketball but now she stopped. Thinking about her huge meal at Mc Donalds she realized she might gain even more weight. All because of that stupid ankle.
She got dressed and walked to her room.

"Fine now I can't play basketball, while I like that, and I'm getting fat and I can't work it of since I can't play basketball. I can't think of anything what can make this day worse."

She knew she of course could do a different kind of exercise but for her it was playing basketball or no sport at all. She also dod't want to give the rest of the team the impression she left them for a other sport. But even if she did do something else like football or cheer leading would she still be able to do that? She was't allowed to jump with her ankle and she knew cheerleader did do that a lot. If jumping was already bad for her ankle kicking a ball would be even worse.So playing a different sport was't a option.

"I feel like I really let my team down. But I would so much rather go on the field with them."

She realized feeling bad about it did't help. Perhaps she could better start thinking about something else. Like Cody. Did she really like him. She knew the twins for some time now and became good friends with both of them. All right she hang out more with Zack because He did't care about rules, was kind of cool, and pretty sportive. But Cody was never far away. But what kind of feelings did she have for Cody. He used to be.... just a friend. But after what happened in Mc Donalds she was't so sure any more. Did she really liked Cody. Also important was the question did he like her. If he did and she did to what did that mean. What did he and she have to do then.

"Life is complicated when your in school. Parents think it's easy. That being a kid is a great Paradise. Well it's not. Everyone who say's that forget how it was to be a kid." She said to herself and sighed deeply. "Why could't Zack hold his thought to his self. If he had't said anything I maybe would't even have weighed myself. At the other hand now I at least know I gained weight. Well it are just a few pounds. That can't be too bad right. But perhaps sitting here without playing and training basketball I gain more weight."

She tried to image herself a lot fatter and went sitting up straight.
15123212.title: Weighing time

151232121.content:
As Maxclosed her eyes, she tried to think to herself what being fat would look like and if she would look good with it. To start off with, Max envisioned what a bigger gut would look like on her. She imagined it as if she looked pregnant, making her look like she had a pot belly. Then, she tried to envision what herself with bigger boobs would be like. She tried to imagine herself with double D boobs instead of B. Then, she tried to add everything else into her vision by adding fat in her arms, a bigger but, a huge muffin top, and stuffed cheeks. After a good minute, Max had a clear vision in her head about a fatter version of herself. She was wearing the same clothes as now with her beanie and loose fitting clothing, except her clothes looked super tight. For fun, she imagined herself inflating as her whole body got bigger and fatter until finally, her clothes ripped. After a little bit, Max snapped out of it.

"Wow. That was done a little too well," Max analyzed.

Max thought about how she could picture every detail of her body getting bigger. Somehow, after all of the imagining, she kind of liked it. She liked the curiosity that came with being fat which involved not knowing how it would really turn out. Suddenly, her stomach began to growl.

"I need some food," Max said as she went downstairs.

As she walked in the kitchen, she looked to the kitchen table and saw what she could munch on right away.

"Cupcakes!" Max yelled as she saw the chocolate icing catch her eye. Slowly, she reached out with one hand.

"Wait, am I really going through with this?" Max asked. At this point, she felt that if she ate the cupcakes, it would be the kiss of death and fattening up would be a reality.

After a minute, her answer was revealed as she grabbed a cupcake, put it to her mouth, and ate it. Quickly, she shoved it down her throat and burped with triumph. She then took the nine other cupcakes and ate them one by one getting frosting in her face. When they were gone, she rubbed her more swollen gut in bliss and tried wiping the messy icing off her face. She grinned a wide smile.

"I am going to become fat!"
151232121.title: That Does Look Good

1512321212.content:
A few days later Max was lying on her bed munching on donuts. She put her plan to become ft really into action. She did't tell anyone about it. She did't want anyone to know. At least not yet. She was careful. She did eat more at breakfast and dinner but most what she did eat were snacks between like pretzels, cupcakes, cookies, chocolate and the donuts who she was eating now. She also went two times to the snack bar. She learned that gaining weight was't just how much you ate but what you ate. Of course that lesson was meant for losing weight but if it worked one way it would also work the other way around. Every day when her parents were out she ate a lot of high fat food.

"Come on belly. You need to grow. Get big and round."

She softly pat her belly. Since she always used to be thin it could take some time before she really would become fat or even chubby, but she felt her belly and noticed a bugle in it. So she did gain. She wanted to wait some more time before she weighed herself to see some real result.
A few pounds did't appeared in just a few days.

"Darn it. Why is it so hard to gain weight."

She grinned knowing that most other people screamed why it was so hard to lose weight. She felt like she was in a upside down world where everybody wanted to be thin but she wanted to be fat.
She did't cared. She always was a outsider. She was a bit of a tomboy and was never really into make-up, dolls or dresses like most other girls and rather hang out with boys playing sports like basketball or doing crazy things with Zack and Cody. For some reason living around them was never boring. There was always going something on in their hotel. Of course it was mostly their fault and it drove Mr. Mosbey crazy.
She rolled on her belly and started thinking of Cody. She did that a lot the past days. For some strange reason she started to like him. While she normally was second in line to tease him after Zack. Mostly because she liked the things he did. She sighed. Life was complicated for a tomboy, 12 year old girl, that was gaining and thinking about getting a boyfriend.
She wolfed down the last donut.

"Men I'm still hungry." She said.

She patted her belly. It seemed like eating so much everyday did made her able to eat more each day. With this thought in her head she planned to eat a bit more after being full. If she kept that up she would be able to each day eat a bit more.
She went down stairs and looked through the cupboards and found two bags of pretzels. She took both up to her room ans started eating them.

"This is going so slowly." She mumbled with full mouth. "There must be a easier way to gain weight. There has to be else there would't be so many fat people. Fat seems to be a world wide epidemic so there has to be a easier way to gain weight fast."

She looked at her sealing while she pushed pretzels in her mouth. She did notice her shirt seemed a bit tighter so she did gain weight but not near as much if she wanted. How was she able to gain more weight?
1512321212.title: Start with the gaining

choices: Max Goes And Eats Following This Advice
15123212121.content:
Immediately, Max thought of a very smart idea. She went to her computer nearby and powered it on. She then went on to the internet and immediately typed in "how to get fatter." Max knew this would be the easiest way to gain weight since other people would know more about the topic than she did overall. After looking, Max clicked on an article and began to read.

"Here are some surefire ways to avoid a healthy lifestyle and pack on some extra blubber while you’re at it. Each tip here has been proven effective at ridding you of a sexy lean body while simultaneously raising your BMI. Enjoy! Well this sounds like it could help," Max said as she began to read on.

"Sleep less. This is a trick which works for a number of reasons. Sleeping less will give your body less rest which will increase your stress throughout the day. Stress is not only a great motivator for eating, but it also increases levels of certain hormones that trigger weight gain. Another reason that sleeping less is great is that now you’ll have more time to eat! For an extra pound or two, try gorging yourself with high calorie foods right before bed. These calories are more likely to be stored as fat!"

Max then continued on even more.

"Snack constantly. Who says that there are only 3 meal times in a day? Five or six meals a day are much better. However, if you can’t get away 6 times a day for a meal, try munching on candy bars and sodas while you wait. A good rule of thumb is to always have some food in or on its way to your mouth."

So far, Max was very surprised with all the information, but she wanted to know more.

"Increase your meal portions. You simply aren’t going to get fat eating small girly portions of food. A surefire way to pack on the pounds is to eat double of whatever you think you need. If you need help in this area, try ordering anything in a restaurant. It’s almost certain that they will provide you with more than one serving of everything. Also, always remember to ’supersize it’ any time you can. The average person can usually process about 700 calories per meal. Anything over that gets stored as fat almost immediately. That’s just what you need to get your body to super-sized proportions quickly."

Max continued on with enthusiasm.

"Eat fried foods. French fries, fried chicken, fried onion rings, etc. are all good. When something is fried, it is literally soaked in oil which means lots of saturated fats. Saturated fats are not only great for gaining weight, but they are also great at giving you all kinds of health problems – particularly with your heart. If you can up your daily intake of fried potatoes, then you’ll definitely have no trouble upping your weight."

Max couldn't stop reading, but took a whole bunch of notes.

"Stop drinking water. Like the veggies, water just takes up precious space in the real estate of your gut. If you really want to get as fat as possible, you should stop drinking water all together. Some even speculate that drinking water can cause you to lose weight in and of itself. If there’s no Coke around, reach for a sweet tea. If there’s no sweet tea, reach for the maple syrup. Water must be avoided at all costs!"

That fact made Max really curious since maple syrup sounded really good at the moment. But, the next fact made her mouth water just from the wording.

"Eat fast food more often. Fast food restaurants are like the embassies of weight gain. These places not only serve the most fattening foods, they also genuinely want to help you in your commitment to put on fat. They provide cheap, fast, and extraordinarily fattening additions to the weight gain diet. Would you like fries with that? Heck Yes! How about a 64oz soft drink with your 1,000 calorie meal? Brilliant!"

With that, Max closed her computer and tried to think of what to do next.
15123212121.title: She Looks On Her Computer

1532.content:
Life isn't always easy, it can drain the life from the very best of us, bring the strongest to their knees and break the sturdiest will. Carrie martin ,a 5'11" brunette who weighs a slight 120lbs, was no exception of this rule after a failing as a pop star the only work the 30 year old singer could get was become the late night singer in the five star hotel the Tipton. The job wasn't great but it provided a stage and a pay check and that was something that any performer wants dare i say needs , but the main selling point was that they provided her with a room free of charge of course she would forfeit things like maid service but Carrie didn't care she was a single mother of twin boys, boys that seem to take pleasure in disobeying her orders.

Well that was five years ago and things are starting to look for Carrie she was given a rise within the first few months of working at the Tipton, she had amassed quite the following among the guests of the hotel now people would come to the hotel with one thing on their mind and that was to hear the voice of Carrie martin, life had stared to smile for the young mum of two.She was given a bigger room with two bedroom instead of one, no longer did she have to suffer the unbearable hardship that was to sleep on the fold out couch while her kids got their own room and beds. Carrie was now free to do what she wanted and she loved it.

Carrie was lazily spread out on her side watching TV in the front room of her suite wearing nothing but her pj's her long leg hanging over the arm of the chair. one hand on the remote mindlessly flicking through the hundreds of channels the hotel provided whilst the other hand was searching for the next sweet multicolored victim to be pulled from its plastic home to be placed in the mouth of the waiting giant. only there was noting left she had eaten the whole packet and not even realized this happened a lot recently Carrie would stuff her face with any food with in reach and finish it without any memory of it. Her belly let out a small grumble...
1532.title: The start of the good life

15322.content:
Her belly called out to her wanting more, demanding to be feed, to be satisfied. Carries capacity to eat and be satisfied has been on a steady rise and it wasn't the only thing that was on the rise her weight has been going up. When she first started singing at the hotel she weighed in at a small 120lbs now after five years of being able to have easy access to the kitchen and the all you can eat buffet, being friends with the head chef can have its advantages which later led to carrie being able to over indulge when e we she wanted and as a result her weight now dialed in at a nice 146lbs (for now). Carries body looked good with the new weight, fuller, rounder, more...womanly and thaks to her height the new weight made her even more popular among the guests, she had acquired a nice pair of newly plumbed up boobs going up a whole cup size going from a c to d and filling that cup to the max, moving down to her stomach with had lost all of its once strong definition,toneless and starting to round she had faint red lines that ran a cross her stomach from where her belly folded makeing small rolls of fat that spill over the waist of her jeans whenever she sat down, her hips and butt weren't speard any of her new weight putting a few more inches any more inches and her thighs would be getting to know one another, up close and personal, all this giving her a nice hour glass look.
"Man I can't believe I ate them all ready jeez I don't even remember eating them" her face went blank void from any emotion as she tried to remember......... nothing she couldn't remember eating them and yet she still wanted more. More and more she tried to remember the hungrier she got the room soon filled with the sound of Carries belly calling for more. Just as one of those calls sounded Cody walked through the front door allowing for the low rumble of his mothers hunger enter his ear.
" wow Jesus mum you sound like you haven't eaten a thing in days" Cody walks over to the chair and takes the seat next to her and gives her a warm smile.
" yeah I ....er.... Skipped breakfast" the lie carrie told her son was better than the truth, that she had just ate a big bag of food and couldn't rember eating it the thourght alone filled her with embarrassment.
"We'll then let me make you a nice bug lunch I've got a few things I'd like to try "
